column1: Where does Ishmael keep a record of whale dimensions that he measured from a skeleton in Tranque?
Before the Pequod had even left Nantucket, Ahab's fake leg had twisted around and very nearly ___
When Starbuck confronts Ahab about leaking oil barrels that are costing the crew profit, how does Ahab respond?
When Queequeg decorates the coffin that he'd had made, what does he use for the decoration?
When Ahab has the blacksmith make a special harpoon for Moby Dick, what does Ahab give him for the metal?
